name: Merry Christmas Jeff-fa-fa DunHam Trivia Game | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where was the Christmas special filmed?
questions.explanation:
Wisconsin.

	More specifically, it was taped at the Pabst Theater in Milwaukee.

questions.text: Who is the first of his character he brings out in this special?
questions.explanation:
Walter.

	Walter comes out and at first refuses to do a Christmas special since it was nowhere near December when the show was taped.

questions.text: What does Walter say they will be next week in the show?
questions.correct: In Minnesota in a waffle house
options: In North Dakota in a shed
questions.explanation:
In Minnesota in a waffle house.

	Walter is not at all impressed with the theatre they are in and calls it a gym at first.

questions.text: What does Jeff say that Achmed has by mistake?
questions.explanation:
poliosis.

	Jeff gets tongue tied when they are talking about polio and scoliosis and ends up mixing the two.

questions.text: Complete this line from "Jingle Bombs". "The only thing that I have left is this _______ on my head."
questions.explanation:
towel.

	Achmed ends this song with his most famous line "I kill you."

questions.text: Why didn't Bubba J send his letter to Santa in the mail?
questions.correct: His computer didn't fit in the mailbox.
questions.explanation:
His computer didn't fit in the mailbox.

	Bubba J is not to smart, so he doesn't realize he could have printed the letter and sent it that way.

questions.text: What did Bubba J do to Santa?
questions.explanation:
set him on fire.

	Actually Bubba J says he didn't set Santa on fire, the fireplace did it.

questions.text: Who does Peanut say Jose celebrates what he calls Navidad with?
questions.explanation:
Phyllis.

	Jose apparently said Feliz Navidad to Peanut at some point which is Spanish for Merry Christmas.  Peanut misunderstood and thought he was doing something called Navidad with a woman named Phyllis.

questions.text: What does Jose say he wore to keep warm when skiing?
questions.explanation:
scarf.

	Peanut said that Jose also wore one boot on his stick.

questions.text: What does Peanut say Santa is guilty of?
questions.explanation:
breaking and entering.

	He also claims that Santa falls down and has a red face so he's a drunk.
